org.snakeskin.utility

Class Ticker

  • org.snakeskin.utility.Ticker

  • public class Ticker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ticker(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<java.lang.Boolean> condition, long threshold) 
      Ticker(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<java.lang.Boolean> condition, double timeThreshold, double timeInterval)
      Time constructor, used to convert times into ticks

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check()
      Checks the condition, and if applicable updates the ticker. If the ticker is at the threshold, this function returns true
      void check(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> action)
      Checks the condition, and if applicable updates the ticker. Runs the provided action if the ticker is at the threshold
      long getTicks()
      The number of currently evaluated ticks. When this equals "max", the check condition is true
      void reset()
      Resets the tick counter to 0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ticker

        public Ticker(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<java.lang.Boolean> condition,
              long threshold)
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to evaluate. Returning true will cause the ticker to increment, returning false will cause the ticker to reset
        threshold - The number of ticks that need to be reached until the ticker will be considered "complete"
        condition - The condition to evaluate. Returning true will cause the ticker to increment, returning false will cause the ticker to reset
        threshold - The number of ticks that need to be reached until the ticker will be considered "complete"

      • Ticker

        public Ticker(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<java.lang.Boolean> condition,
              double timeThreshold,
              double timeInterval)

        Time constructor, used to convert times into ticks

        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to evaluate. Returning true will cause the ticker to increment, returning false will cause the ticker to reset
        timeThreshold - The threshold of time that needs to be reached until the ticker will be considered "complete"
        timeInterval - The interval in which the ticker's "check" function will be called. Note that for performance reasons the ticker is not tracking time for you, and thus it is your job as the caller to ensure that you are maintaining the interval

    • Method Detail

      • getTicks

        public long getTicks()

        The number of currently evaluated ticks. When this equals "max", the check condition is true

      • reset

        public void reset()

        Resets the tick counter to 0

      • check

        public boolean check()

        Checks the condition, and if applicable updates the ticker. If the ticker is at the threshold, this function returns true

      • check

        public void check(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> action)

        Checks the condition, and if applicable updates the ticker. Runs the provided action if the ticker is at the threshold
